backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no implemented methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing implemented website pages, components, and associated files for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list summarizing each frontend file's purpose and role in the static site.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens applied globally.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root config setting up TanStack Router routes and wrapping the app in ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/ContactDetailsCa: Displays contact info and business hours using cards with icons.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive header with logo, nav links, theme-based logo switching, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCategoryS: Renders a titled service category with icon and grid of service cards.
frontend/src/components/ServicePreviewGr: Grid preview of four primary freight services with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, quick links, services, and contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with header, footer, and main content layout.
frontend/src/components/StatsStrip.tsx: Displays a set of logistics-related stats with icons in a grid strip.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity authentication and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder indicating no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/contactValidation.ts: Validates contact form fields for name, email, service, and message.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with company story, stats, values, and imagery.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements the contact form with validation, submission state, and contact details section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: React page rendering the home hero, highlights, stats, and service preview sections with CTA links and imagery.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: React page defining structured freight service categories and passing them to section components for display.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, shadows, animations, and container settings with plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site purpose, required features, image assets, and current state configuration.
